mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Student (stuId, stuAge, stuBirthday, stuEmail, stuGender, stuName, gmtCreate, gmtModify, isReal) VALUE (#{stuId}, #{stuAge}, #{stuBirthday}, #{stuEmail}, #{stuGender}, #{stuName}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModify}, 1)
mapper.update:
UPDATE Student
stuAge = #{stuAge},
stuBirthday = #{stuBirthday},
stuEmail = #{stuEmail},
stuGender = #{stuGender},
stuName = #{stuName},
gmtModify = #{gmtModify},
WHERE stuId = #{stuId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Student WHERE stuId = #{stuId} AND isReal = 1
SELECT * FROM Student WHERE stuName LIKE '%${value}%' AND isReal = 1
